original_text: Now the Passover and the Festival of Unleavened Bread were only two days away, and the chief priests and the teachers of the law were scheming to arrest Jesus secretly and kill him.
korean_text: 이틀이 지나면 유월절과 무교절이라 대제사장들과 서기관들이 예수를 흉계로 잡아 죽일 방도를 구하며

sentences.original_text: Now the Passover and the Festival of Unleavened Bread were only two days away
sentences.korean_translation: 유월절과 무교절이 이틀밖에 남지 않았을 때

sentences.original_text: and the chief priests and the teachers of the law were scheming
to arrest Jesus secretly and kill him
